Featured.Title: Title 1
Featured.Description: Squid Game was No. 1 in the world, like everywhere in the world, Sarandos, who is also the head of contentat Netflix, said Monday at the Code conference in LosAngeles. The Korean series is already set to be Netflixsbiggest show.  SYNOPSIS Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strangeinvitation to compete in childrens games. Inside, atempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survivalgame that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.  MUSIC Walter was asked to contribute to the score by licensingsome of his music through his publisher Universal Music. Hewas also tasked to write tracks and additional arrangementswhich were used in the show and in several marketingcampaigns for NETFLIXs new smash-hit series.  To capture the unnerving vibe of the series Walter employeda large selection of drums and found sounds.From big-scale taiko drums to re-amped finger snips, nopercussive instrument was too large or too small to add to adense soundscape.  For the more etherial and atmospheric soundscapes Walterused his large scale modular synth rig. Adding vintageeffects helped blend sounds and ingest an emotionalcomponent that describes the desperation of the charactersin the show.

TendingNow.Title: Title 2
TendingNow.Description: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, arescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey across thestate in order to rescue his estranged daughter.Starring Dwayne Johnson, Alexandra Daddario, Carla Gugino.Directed by Brad Peyton. Opens May 29th 2015

TendingNow.Title: Title 6
TendingNow.Description: Trailer de la tercera temporada de Hannibal.

TendingNow.Title: Title 7
TendingNow.Description: I have been in a bit of a creative funk, so I decided to stretch my creative editing legs and do a quick recut of the very first episode of the currently three-season phenomenon that is Sherlock.I did very little in the way of sound treatment: I was solely looking to make something fun, and to practice some editing on a project that didn't have anything to do with the information-based modules I have spent a great deal of time on this year. So - being enthused by some recuts of famous films, I thought that I would give it a go. Ergo, a faux-trailer for a potential Holmes thriller has emerged.Tech details are simple: I used Adobe Premiere Pro CC for the entire sequence. And of course, the rights remain the sole property of the respective owners, and no infringement was intended.

TendingNow.Title: Title 15
TendingNow.Description: I have been in a bit of a creative funk, so I decided to stretch my creative editing legs and do a quick recut of the very first episode of the currently three-season phenomenon that is Sherlock.I did very little in the way of sound treatment: I was solely looking to make something fun, and to practice some editing on a project that didn't have anything to do with the information-based modules I have spent a great deal of time on this year. So - being enthused by some recuts of famous films, I thought that I would give it a go. Ergo, a faux-trailer for a potential Holmes thriller has emerged.Tech details are simple: I used Adobe Premiere Pro CC for the entire sequence. And of course, the rights remain the sole property of the respective owners, and no infringement was intended.
